item.title: Hooks
item.description: It might be useful to run certain scripts before and after the run, e.g. starting some infrastructure, preloading database, gathering CPU stats during the test and so on. That’s why Hyperfoil introduces pre- and post-hooks to the run. Some scripts are not specific to the test being run - these should be deployed on controller as files in *root*/hooks/pre/ and *root*/hooks/post directories where root is controller’s root directory, /tmp/hyperfoil/ by default.
